content: We added back a total of $8.3 million pre-tax, which is comprised of three items: first, $3.9 million in non-cash share-based compensation, and as discussed last quarter, we anticipate a quarterly run rate of just under $4 million moving forward; second, adjustment to expenses is $1.7 million of amortization expense related to prior acquisitions, we have set this to be the same in the fourth quarter; lastly, $2.7 million related primarily to reorganization and integration costs.
